str2: In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To make known, declare, know, discover. From a derivative of ginosko; to make known; subjectively, to know.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From the base of pletho; wealth, i.e. money, possessions, or abundance, richness, valuable bestowment.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
From the base of dokeo; glory, in a wide application.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
A vessel, implement, equipment or apparatus (specially, a wife as contributing to the usefulness of the husband).
Pity, mercy, compassion. Of uncertain affinity; compassion.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Plural
Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To prepare or appoint beforehand, predestine. From pro and hetoimazo; to fit up in advance.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
From the base of dokeo; glory, in a wide application.
